name: Into Conflict
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48

You are a nation in this is a small strategy game. Your goal is to amass power to conquer all the territory on the map while not ruining your world reputation. Eventually, you will be attacked by all the other players. Will you be able to come out on top?

  • WASD to move the camera around
  • Left Click and Right Click to do stuff

Tried to fit the theme "Deeper and Deeper" by making a game where you get "deeper and deeper" into conflict.
